titleNullable: Traffic Volume in Brazil's Highway Toll Plazas
subtitleNullable: Dataset provided by Brazil's National Agency for Land Transport
descriptionNullable:
# Traffic Volume in Brazil's Highway Toll Plazas

This dataset contains the traffic volume, in toll plazas, of Brazilian federal highways. It includes data from 2010 to 2019. The dataset discriminates the number of each vehicle type, for instance, motorcycle, truck, passenger car, based on the toll fee (check the ``Categoria'' field). 

The dataset is can be downloaded at ANTT (Agência Nacional de Transportes Terrestres) website (see source) and is made available to the public under the Creative Commons CC-BY license.

I am a professor and my goal on formatting this dataset in Kaggle was to enable my students and others to analyze the data and forecast how the traffic volume will change in the following years.

### Dataset Dictionary
| Field | Type | Format | Description
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  concessionaria | String |  | Name of the transportation concessionaire that provided the data |
| mes_ano | String | mmm-dd | Reference date of the data. Format is month-day (e.g., jan-17). |
| sentido | String | | Highway orientation, _e.g._, norte (north), sul (south), lest (east), oeste (west), sentido 1 (direction 1), sentido 2 (direction 2) |
| praca | String | | Toll name |
| categoria | String | | The vehicle category in the toll fare table (different vehicles may pay the same fee) |
| tipo_de_veiculo | String | | The vehicle classification. Ex: Comercial, Moto (Motorcycle), Passeio (Passenger Car) |
| volume_total | Number | | Total number of vehicles that passed in the given toll |

### Dataset Source
- ANTT (Agência Nacional de Transportes Terrestres -- Brazil's National Agency for Land Transport)
- URL: [https://dados.antt.gov.br/group/rodovias](https://dados.antt.gov.br/group/rodovias)

### Banner Image

Credit: MARCO AURÉLIO ESPARZA / CC BY-SA (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0)
